Description: TridentGroup is a USD 1 billion Indian business conglomerate and global player. With recent expansion and modernization, we are now the largest Terry Towel manufacturer in the world. Trident has an installed capacity of 688 looms capable of producing 360 million pieces of towels and 1 million pieces of bathrobes annually. We have made new foray into the bed linen segment. With customer base across 6 continents, we have frequently received accolades from our patrons who are stalwarts of the retail world. With state-of-the-art manufacturing processes and export turnover for Terry Towel accounting for 90% of total sales of the Company, Trident has emerged as one of the largest integrated home textile manufacturers of the world.
